SupavisioJ.Spectra

Class Spectra

  • java.lang.Object
    • SupavisioJ.Spectra.Spectra

  • public class Spectra
extends Object
    Class Spectra responsible for generating a spectra object using an ADC object, and optionally the boundary energy values.

        public Spectra(ADC adc,
       String nameFile)
        This is the basic constructor when you want create a Spectra from an ADC
        Parameters:
        nameFile - name of the file (ex : "name".pixe (or an other extension) contains the ADC information)

       String nameFile,
       float energyMin,
       boolean startAtEnergMin)
        Use this constructor if the Spectra don't start at the channel 0
        Parameters:
        startAtEnergMin - if true the first channel is adjusted

      • energyExist

        public boolean energyExist(float energy)
        Use this method to check if an energy exists in the Spectra
        Parameters:
        energy - the energy to check
        Returns:
        true if the energy exists.

      • generatePicture

        public ImageGenerated[] generatePicture(float[][] startEnd)
        same as generatePicture(start,end) but read the ADC only once for several ImageGenerateds
        Parameters:
        startEnd - array containing the two bounding values for each ImageGenerated

      • generatePicture

        public ImageGenerated generatePicture(float start,
                             float end)
        generatePicture method creates a new ImageGenerated using this Spectra and two
        Parameters:
        start - float value and
        end - fload value as bounding values

           MainFrame parentWindow)

      • restoreImgGen

        public ImageGenerated restoreImgGen(String path)
        method restores imageGenerateds of this Spectra from the given path
        Parameters:
        path - absolute path to the file to restore
        Returns:
        the restored ImageGenerated or null if unsuccessfull

      • save

        public void save(String directory)
        the save method stores spectra data to a file in the given directory
        Parameters:
        directory - where the Spectra will be save

      • saveAllImgGen

        public String[] saveAllImgGen(String directory)
        Uses the method save of ImageGenerated for all the ImageGenerateds produced by this Spectra
        Parameters:
        directory - where all the ImageGen will be saved
        Returns:
        an arraylist containing the name of the saved ImageGen

      • searchMax

        public int searchMax(String valToSearch)
        Use this method to search the max "x" or "y". It will help to define the resolution of an ImageGenerated
        Parameters:
        valToSearch - give the element to search : "x", "y" or "E"/"e" are accepted (all other values will be considered as "E")
        Returns:
        the max value of the given element (valToSearch)

        public void setLevel(int level)
